text: Patrizia Medail (born 15 November 1945) is an Italian alpine skier. She competed in the women's giant slalom at the 1964 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Italy Category:Alpine skiers at the 1964 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Bologna
title: Patrizia Medail
